column3: Faculty of Engineering, Environment and Computing
column5: The MSc Civil Engineering Project Management aims to help you establish or advance your career in the global construction industry. Designed with input from industry, the course teaches an innovative mix of technical and construction project management, applicable to civil engineering contexts.From concept to construction, we aim to cover the technical skills required to analyse, design and develop sound solutions to civil engineering projects. Using case studies, practical sessions, simulation labs and site visits to live projects, you will apply engineering principles and use computer modelling techniques to analyse complex engineering systems, gaining valuable experience of the work you will carry out in an industrial context.
column7: UK Fees: 10400 | 4000 (Work placement option additional fee)  International Fees: 16600 | 4000 (Work placement option additional fee)
column9: 1 year full time, 2 years part time
